name: Handmade Tote Bag
description: A spacious, stylish tote bag handmade with premium materials. Perfect for everyday use.

name: Handmade Crossbody Bag
description: A chic crossbody bag with adjustable strap and multiple pockets, crafted by hand.

name: Handmade Backpack
description: A durable handmade backpack featuring a unique design and plenty of storage space.

name: Mini Shoulder Bag
description: A compact handmade shoulder bag ideal for carrying essentials on the go.

name: Classic Handbag
description: A timeless handmade handbag with elegant lines and quality craftsmanship.

name: Vintage Messenger Bag
description: A vintage-inspired handmade messenger bag made from sturdy canvas and leather.

name: Stylish Clutch
description: A handmade clutch bag perfect for evening events, featuring fine detailing and a secure clasp.

name: Eco-Friendly Shopper
description: A handmade eco-friendly shopping bag crafted from sustainable materials.

name: Convertible Daypack
description: A versatile handmade daypack that converts from a backpack to a tote bag with ease.

name: Limited Edition Satchel
description: A limited-edition handmade satchel bag that combines functionality with exclusive design elements.
